JobFullDesc: The Agency Solutions Manager is a strategic and enthusiastic solution-driver who puts Facebook customers at the core of everything they do. They have a passion for advertising and believe the future of marketing is identity-based, data-driven and grounded in measurable business results. With proven, hands-on understanding of both online and traditional media and the Mexican agency ecosystem, the ASM is responsible for partnering with agencies to develop industry-specific relationships, to constantly increase agencies’ FB products and solution capability level, construct approaches to scale the outreach of local partners, and use data and analytics to drive informed decisioning and solution adoption. Success in this position requires strong consultative and analytical skills, a focus on providing excellent service, and the ability to thrive in a dynamic, team-focused environment delivering against tight deadlines.
